title: Dariush Mehrjui - Pari (1995)
description:
Loosely adapted by director Dariush Mehrjui from "Franny and Zooey" by J.D. Salinger, Pari is the story of spiritual turmoil and the quest for redemption in an Islamic context. It is the second film in Mehrjui's trilogy featuring female protagonists, the other two being Sara (1993) and Leila (1996).
